name: Antagonist (itch) (M2neko)
description: Antagonist represents the opponent, the enemy, but also hides the word ant; while the Chinese word YiHou represents the queen ant, the honorable existence, but also homophones to the word "future" of girl's whirling life. The game has three chapters, and the little girl needs to escape the old house which makes her love and hate with the help of different items.
